events.name: AddedItemToCart
events.summary: Holds information about what the user added to their shopping cart.

events.name: OrderComplete
events.summary: Event represents when an order has been complete. (Delivered and finished)

events.name: OrderConfirmed
events.summary: Event represents when an order has been confirmed and ready to be processed (shipped for example)

events.name: OrderRequested
events.summary: Holds information about the customers order.

events.name: PaymentProcessed
events.summary: Holds information about the payment that has been processed.

events.name: RemovedItemFromCart
events.summary: Holds information about what the user removed from their cart.

events.name: ShipmentDelivered
events.summary: Event represents when a shipment has been delievered and received.

events.name: ShipmentDispatched
events.summary: Event represents when a shipment has been dispatched.

events.name: ShipmentPrepared
events.summary: Event represents when a shipment has finished being prepared and is ready to be dispatched.
